Tender Details: Request for Quotation (RFQ) - Samsung ProCare Android Support
================================================ помещserverupload_a

### Request for Quotation: BPM016855A
==============================================

**Solicitation Details**
------------------------

Reference Number: PW-22-01005648
Solicitation Number: BPM016855A
Publication Date: August 29, 2022
Tender Closing Date: September 7, 2022, 2:00:00 PM

**Brief Description of the Requirement**
-----------------------------------------

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a provider for Samsung ProCare Android Support or an equivalent. The contract will be used to provide technical support for existing Samsung Android devices.

**Key Requirements**
---------------------

* Samsung ProCare Android Support for existing devices (MI-OVCPAB)
* Samsung Mobile Deployment Service (per month) (MI-OVMTAA1)

**Security Requirements**
-------------------------

None.

**Trade Agreements**
---------------------

This tender is subject to the following agreements:

* Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Submission Instructions**
---------------------------

To respond to this RFQ, bidders must follow the instructions in the Request for Quotation document, which can be accessed through the P2P tool at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/).

**Contact Information**
---------------------

James Graves, Procurement Team Leader
Shared Services Canada (SSC)
Networks, End Users and Cyber Security (NEUCS)
Procurement and Vendor Relations
180 Kent Street, 13th Floor, 13-140
Ottawa, Ontario
Phone: (613) 668-9563
E-mail: james.graves2@canada.ca

**Attachments**
--------------

The following documents are attached to this RFQ:

* Annex A - Statement of Work (SOW)
* Annex B - Pricing Table
* Annex C - Mandatory Requirements for Equivalent Products
* Annex D - Resulting Contract Clauses

Note that these documents can be accessed through the P2P tool at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/). However, if there are any issues with access, please contact James Graves at
